meanings.definition: The state or quality of being literate.
meanings.sent1: Her literatenesses was evident in the way she effortlessly read the book.
meanings.sent2: Education is important for achieving literatenesses in society.
meanings.sent3: The literatenesses of the cat trying to read the newspaper was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His literatenesses shone brightly in the sea of illiteracy around him.
meanings.sent5: The literatenesses of the students was a beacon of hope for the future.

meanings.definition: The ability to read and write.
meanings.sent1: The young boy's literatenesses allowed him to enjoy many books.
meanings.sent2: Improving literatenesses is a key goal of educational programs.

meanings.sent4: Her literatenesses was a powerful tool in navigating the world around her.
